name: Mayor T-Rex
description:
Rrrrrrrrrr ...They are Dinossssss......Welcome in this new adventure-action game!

Major T-Rex and his gang are back in town. A new apocalypse is coming because the nature can no longer support humans and their constructions. They will ruin everything in front of them until they are heard again and the army can't stop them either.

Your mission as a Tyrannosaurus rex is to destory everything you can in every area of the city even the military until you will become the new mayor of the city.

Game Features :
- 10 levels
- 4 unique Dino’s
- Dinosaur's life meter
- As you pass the levels, they will become harder
